LanguageData.OMG_Helmet_Classic.label: Mercenary Helmet(Classic)
LanguageData.OMG_Helmet_Classic.description: Highly modified heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Mercenaries.\n\nThis modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Corsair.label: Mercenary Armor(Corsair)
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Corsair.description: Highly modified heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Mercenaries.\n\nThis modification with the addition of a Smokepop pack and deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Demolition.label: Mercenary Armor(Demolition)
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Demolition.description: Highly modified heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Mercenaries.\n\nThis modification with installing a Grenade Launcher and deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Commando.label: Mercenary Armor(Commando)
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Commando.description: Highly modified heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Mercenaries.\n\nThis modification with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered turret and deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Swarmling.label: Mercenary Armor(Swarmling)
LanguageData.OMG_Armor_Swarmling.description: Highly modified heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Mercenaries.\n\nThis modification with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered drones and deprives item's quality levels.

Highly modified heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Mercenaries.

This variation provides the owner acess to orbital of weather-control satellites.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.
